description: Surrender to divine feminine energy through foot worship and submission in ethereal dreamscapes.

chapters.name: Temple of Divine Feet
chapters.description: You arrive at a mystical temple where goddess energy flows through sacred foot worship.

chapters.name: Goddess Blessing Ritual
chapters.description: Receive the goddess's blessing through intimate foot worship and energy exchange.
chapters.textPrompt: The goddess extends her perfect foot toward me, her skin glowing with divine light. I kneel reverently, feeling waves of submission and bliss wash over me as I prepare to worship her sacred feet...

chapters.name: Transcendent Worship
chapters.description: Achieve spiritual transcendence through complete devotion and worship of the divine feminine.
chapters.audioScript: The goddess's voice fills your mind as you worship her feet with complete devotion, your consciousness expanding into realms of pure submission and bliss...

author: Divine Feminine Collective
